title: Health and Medicine 1
sentences: I am unfortunately sick and am staying in bed.
Do you have a high fever?
I have a strong cough today.
I need a medicine for the pain.
Please go to the doctor quickly.
I buy tablets in the pharmacy.
The patient is waiting in the room.
I have an appointment at the dentist.
I need a prescription for the pills.
The injection didn't hurt at all.
I have an allergy to pollen.
My blood pressure is too high today.
Do you have a band-aid for the wound?
The wound must heal in peace.
The hospital is just around the corner.
Do you also have a runny nose?
I wish you a speedy recovery.
dictionary:
krank - sick
das Fieber - fever
der Husten - cough
das Medikament - medicine / medication
der Arzt - doctor
die Apotheke - pharmacy
weh tun - to hurt
der Schmerz (Pl. Schmerzen) - pain
der Patient - patient
der Termin - appointment
der Zahnarzt - dentist
die Krankenversicherung - health insurance
das Rezept - prescription
sich ausruhen - to rest
die Spritze - injection / shot
die Allergie - allergy
der Blutdruck - blood pressure
das Pflaster - band-aid / plaster
heilen - to heal
schwach - weak
die Tablette (Pl. Tabletten) - tablet / pill
die Erkältung - cold
das Krankenhaus - hospital
gebrochen - broken
der Schnupfen - runny nose / sniffles
die Besserung - recovery / improvement
